name: Early Thermal Forest Fire Detection using UAV and Saliency Maps
description: Developed a UAV-based system for early detection of thermal forest fires using saliency maps.

name: Street Litter Detection
description: Developed a street litter detector using YOLOv5 model based on the Euclidean approach. Trained on PennFudan and TACO datasets, achieving an F1 score of 89%. Deployed on real-time CCTVs for efficient litter detection.

name: Self-Balancing Bike with LQR Controller
description: Developed and implemented a specialized LQR controller for a self-balancing bike with a single reaction wheel. Verified through simulations in V-rep software and successfully constructed the bike using Solidworks 2023, focusing on autonomous item delivery.
